HarperCollins Other Work

Digital Branding

overview


These are additional projects I completed this summer to refresh the digital branding at HarperCollins Publishers. From their authors to their imprints, here are some of my designs.

Four options for rebranding Harper Reference to Collins Reference. Chosen option is here.
Newsletter banner options for author Karin Slaughter, where she wanted to include a photo of her cat.
A promotional image for BookPerk in collaboration with the HarperCollins sales team.
